text.div:
Id: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.TBE.Encepur
Url: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Version: 0.2.0
Title: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Status: draft
Date: 2025-07-17 20:56:23+0000
Publisher: WHO
Description:

Determine required vaccinations
Knowledge Capability: computable
Related Artifacts:

References

  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)


  • Vaccines against tick-borne encephalitis: WHO position paper (June 2011) (19)


  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)


  • Vaccines against tick-borne encephalitis: WHO position paper (June 2011) (19)


  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1) Vaccines against tick-borne encephalitis: WHO position paper (June 2011) (19)


  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)
Libraries:
DTs.TBE
Actions:
Client is not due for TBE vaccination: Client is not due for TBE vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" The vaccines manufactured in Austria and Germany (FSME-Immun and Encepur) can be given from > 1 year of age.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for TBE vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first TBE dose as client's age is less than 1 year. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for TBE vaccination: Client is due for TBE vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for TBE vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first TBE dose as no TBE doses have been administered and client's age is more than 1 year. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for TBE vaccination: Client is not due for TBE vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" For the conventional vaccination schedule the dose interval is 1–3 months between doses 1 and 2. For Encepur, the accelerated schedule requires vaccination on days 0 and 14, followed by a third dose delivered 9–12 months later. In addition, Encepur may be used on a rapid schedule, with vaccination on days 0, 7 and 21, followed by a fourth dose delivered 12–18 months later.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for TBE vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second TBE dose as the latest dose was administered less than 1 month ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for TBE vaccination: Client is due for TBE vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" For the conventional vaccination schedule, the dose interval is 1–3 months between doses 1 and 2.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for TBE vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second TBE dose as the latest dose was administered more than 1 month ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for TBE vaccination: Client is not due for TBE vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" For Encepur, the requirement is 9–12 months between doses 2 and 3.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for TBE vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with third TBE dose as the latest dose was administered less than 9 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for TBE vaccination: Client is due for TBE vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for TBE vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with third TBE dose as the latest dose was administered more than 9 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
The primary series is complete. Client is not due for TBE booster dose: The primary series is complete. Client is not due for TBE booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "TBE vaccines") Vaccination against the disease requires a primary series of 3 doses; those who will continue to be at risk should probably have ≥1 booster doses. For both vaccines (FSME-Immun and Encepur) the manufacturers recommend a booster dose to be administered 3 years after completion of the primary series.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output The primary series is complete. Client is not due for TBE booster dose
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with TBE booster dose as the latest TBE dose was administered less than 3 years ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
The primary series is complete: The primary series is complete Client is due for TBE booster dose "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "TBE vaccines")
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output The primary series is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with TBE booster dose as the primary series has been completed and the latest TBE dose was administered more than 3 years ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Vaccination against the disease requires a primary series of 3 doses; those who will continue to be at risk should probably have ≥1 booster doses. Although there is a strong indication that the spacing of boosters could be expanded considerably from the intervals currently recommended by the manufacturers (every 3–5 years), the evidence is still insufficient for a definitive recommendation on the optimal frequency and number of booster doses.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Assess if supplementary booster TBE dose(s) are necessary and create a clinical note. Check for any vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

action.title: Client is not due for TBE vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for TBE vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

The vaccines manufactured in Austria and Germany (FSME-Immun and Encepur) can be given from > 1 year of age.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with first TBE dose as client's age is less than 1 year. 
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

action.title: Client is due for TBE vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for TBE vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with first TBE dose as no TBE doses have been administered and client's age is more than 1 year. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Client is not due for TBE vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for TBE vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

For the conventional vaccination schedule the dose interval is 1–3 months between doses 1 and 2. For Encepur, the accelerated schedule requires vaccination on days 0 and 14, followed by a third dose delivered 9–12 months later. In addition, Encepur may be used on a rapid schedule, with vaccination on days 0, 7 and 21, followed by a fourth dose delivered 12–18 months later.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with second TBE dose as the latest dose was administered less than 1 month ago. 
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

action.title: Client is due for TBE vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for TBE vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

For the conventional vaccination schedule, the dose interval is 1–3 months between doses 1 and 2.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with second TBE dose as the latest dose was administered more than 1 month ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Client is not due for TBE vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for TBE vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

For Encepur, the requirement is 9–12 months between doses 2 and 3.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with third TBE dose as the latest dose was administered less than 9 months ago. 
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

action.title: Client is due for TBE vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for TBE vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with third TBE dose as the latest dose was administered more than 9 months ago.
Check for contraindications.

action.title: The primary series is complete. Client is not due for TBE booster dose
action.description:
The primary series is complete. Client is not due for TBE booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "TBE vaccines")

Vaccination against the disease requires a primary series of 3 doses; those who will continue to be at risk should probably have ≥1 booster doses. For both vaccines (FSME-Immun and Encepur) the manufacturers recommend a booster dose to be administered 3 years after completion of the primary series.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with TBE booster dose as the latest TBE dose was administered less than 3 years ago. 
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the booster dose.

action.title: The primary series is complete
action.description:
The primary series is complete
Client is due for TBE booster dose
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
"Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "TBE vaccines")

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with TBE booster dose as the primary series has been completed and the latest TBE dose was administered more than 3 years ago. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
action.description:
Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"

Vaccination against the disease requires a primary series of 3 doses; those who will continue to be at risk should probably have ≥1 booster doses. Although there is a strong indication that the spacing of boosters could be expanded considerably from the intervals currently recommended by the manufacturers (every 3–5 years), the evidence is still insufficient for a definitive recommendation on the optimal frequency and number of booster doses.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Assess if supplementary booster TBE dose(s) are necessary and create a clinical note. 
Check for any vaccines due.
